data.title: How to Watch WUPA (The CW 69) Live Without Cable in 2024 - Your Top 3 Options
data.meta_description: Looking for a WUPA live stream? You're in luck! There are 3 options to watch WUPA without cable.
data.text:
Flixed Team • June 26, 2024

Watch Local Channels Free in Atlanta

You can watch WUPA ( The CW affiliate) for free by tuning into Channel 69 on your antenna for the live broadcast.

Looking for an HD antenna for free local channels? Get a free HD antenna ($45 value) when you prepay for Sling.

Try Sling by itself to watch your favorite national channels like ESPN, TNT, BET, HGTV, ID, and more. Read more about Sling's channel lineup.

Sign up below to try Sling TV .

Stream Local Channels in Atlanta

You can stream WUPA ( The CW affiliate) with Hulu with Live TV, fuboTV and YouTube TV.

If you’re looking for a well-rounded streaming service with local channels in Atlanta , then we recommend Hulu with Live TV for watching WUPA (The CW 69) and 64 other national and local channels including ESPN, Discovery, A&E, ABC, History and more .

Whether it’s sports or local programming, Hulu offers the best balance between affordability and convenience. Read on further for our breakdown.

Sign up below to try Hulu with Live TV .

Alternatively, if you're looking for the option with the most live content (including WUPA) then fuboTV is your best bet. Additionally, fuboTV offers 112 other national and local channels including ESPN, AMC, A&E, OWN, History and more

Local Channels in Atlanta

Including WUPA , Hulu with Live TV offers 6 local channels with networks including The CW, ABC, CBS, FOX, NBC, and Telemundo if you're streaming from Atlanta .

In comparison, fuboTV offers 7 local channels . Sling TV does not offer WUPA in their catalogue.

ABCCBSFOXNBCThe CWUnivisionTelemundo

Upcoming Live Sports

Loading...

Regional Sports Networks

Hulu with Live TV, Sling TV, fuboTV and YouTube TV do not support regional sports networks in Atlanta .

Supported Devices

You can stream WUPA on your Roku, Chromecast, Apple TV, Amazon Fire TV, Android/iOS devices, and web browser (since they're all supported by Hulu with Live TV, fuboTV, Sling TV, and YouTube TV).

As well, Hulu with Live TV also supports gaming consoles like Microsoft Xbox consoles and the Nintendo Switch.

If you want to find out more about device support across streaming providers, be sure to check out our detailed articles:

Hulu with Live TV Device Support

We also have more information about devices (and how to pick them) here.

Local TV Guides

Here are nearby TV guides you can use to see schedules for local programming, including the WUPA schedule. As well, if you're looking for live content schedules for other cities, or TV guides for services like Hulu, then check out the Flixed TV Guide.
